page.title: 12 Child's Morning-Boars Hill
page.content: I usually get up at 7 a.m. and having washed and dressed I come downstairs to have my breakfast. I usually have a cereal such as a rusk or Weatabix and a drink of coffee. At about 8-30 a.m. I set off for school, if it is fine I walk, if it is raining my mum takes me by car. I get to school in time for a short play with my friends before school starts at 9 a.m. We begin with an assembly during which we talk about some interesting topic, say some prayers and sing a hymn or song. On Wednesday morning the assembly is taken by Father Keith our Parish Priest. The rest of the morning is usually spent on mathmatics & English exercises. I have a school dinner but most of my friends bring a packed lunch box.We play until afternoon school begins at 1 p.m.
